mapper.select: SELECT A.ARTIST_NUM, A.ARTIST_NAME,A.ARTIST_IMG, I.ARTINFO_NUM, I.ARTINFO_IMG, COUNT(F.ARTIST_NUM) FOLLOWER FROM ARTIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ART_INFO I ON A.ARTIST_NUM=I.ARTIST_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN ARTIST_FOLLOWER F ON A.ARTIST_NUM=F.ARTIST_NUM GROUP BY A.ARTIST_NUM, A.ARTIST_NAME, A.ARTIST_IMG, I.ARTINFO_NUM, I.ARTINFO_IMG ORDER BY FOLLOWER DESC

SELECT A.ARTIST_NUM, A.ARTIST_NAME, A.ARTIST_IMG, I.ARTINFO_IMG, COUNT(M.ARTIST_NUM) FOLLOWER FROM ARTIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ARTIST_FOLLOWER M ON A.ARTIST_NUM = M.ARTIST_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN ART_INFO I ON M.ARTIST_NUM = I.ARTIST_NUM WHERE A.ARTIST_NUM IN(SELECT A.ARTIST_NUM FROM ARTIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ARTIST_FOLLOWER M ON A.ARTIST_NUM = M.ARTIST_NUM WHERE M.ID = #{userId}) GROUP BY A.ARTIST_NUM, A.ARTIST_NAME, A.ARTIST_IMG, I.ARTINFO_IMG ORDER BY FOLLOWER DESC
